Content:
Hello, my name is Ross.

My 1st motorbike was a 1983 Yamaha RZ 350. I put on the biggest Metzeler tires I could get to help me from dropping the bike, which I did just once at about 5mph riding up a little ramp onto a sidewalk ..... no scrapes !

I've owned a Italian bike - 1958 F.B. Mondial 125 for almost 30 years now.
I also have a 1966 BMW R69S
